collections.title: Horse Grooming Gear & Accessories
collections.description: A great range of grooming gear for home and competition. Great brands and quality products from Australia and international manufacturers. Popular brands include Champion Tails shampoo and the Equinade range. Another hugely popular brand is Cowboy Magic shampoos and conditioners for horses. Also check out Hairy Pony and Sterling Essentials.

collections.title: Horse Health & Nutrition
collections.description: A great range of health and nutrition products for your horse or pony. Includes feed supplements, vitamins and minerals, medicines, topical spray and ointments, and everything else in between. Check out our hoof care selection, fly and insect repellent for horses, and equine vitamins and supplements.

collections.title: Saddle Blankets, Pads & Squares
collections.description: We have a really cool range of top quality pads and blankets for all disciplines including jumping, dressage, all purpose, sheepskin, and western saddle blankets. Brands include the popular Thinline and Lemieux, and the PS Of Sweden range.

collections.title: Competition, Training & Casual - Horse Riding Clothes
collections.description: We list some of most popular and premium equestrian clothing brands available in Australia. Both Australian and international brands to purchase online. Our range include tops, quality women's breeches, and men's breeches, competition jackets, casual wear and more for men, women and children. Other popular collections include the riding tights range.

collections.title: Bridles & Strapping - Top Brands For All Disciplines
collections.description: We list a great range of bridles, reins, breastplates, martingales, rings, halters, everything else in between. Top brands including the popular Micklem bridle and Australian made bridles and strapping.

collections.title: Pets - Products For Dogs, Cats, & Other Small Animals
collections.description: Below you can see our range of quality pet products from some of the best and most popular brands available in Australia. Categories included are dog food, dog coats and rugs, dog accessories, pet grooming, pet treats, pet toys, pet health, and much more.

collections.title: Shop Cavalleria Toscana Equestrian Apparel & Horse Gear
collections.description: Below you can see the full range of Cavalleria Toscana products. With a brilliant range including breeches for men and women, saddle pads, competition jackets, CT shirts, and CT tops, you'll be sure to find exactly what you're looking for from this European equestrian apparel and fashion powerhouse.

collections.title: On Sale - Discount On The Best Brands & Gear
collections.description: Below you can view all products that are currently on sale in our store. Use the filters on the left sidebar (or top middle if on mobile) to filter results as you need.

collections.title: Shop Samshield Helmets & Equestrian Products
collections.description: Check out the great range of Samshield helmets, equestrian gear and products. This brand has an amazing reputation for high quality products. Browse below the options.

collections.title: Shop & Buy Horse Bits - Quality Brands - All Types
collections.description: We have a large range of bits for every purpose, including some of the most popular brands. Check out the amazing Bombers Bits range, Trust bits, Sprenger bits, and more. Also see our Myler bits, snaffle bits, and Pelham bits collection.

collections.title: Shop & Buy Ariat Clothing & Footwear
collections.description: Below you can see the great range of the very popular Ariat country and equestrian products, including Ariat boots and footwear, Ariat breeches, tops, jeans, jackets, bags and more.

collections.title: Horse Riding Boots & Footwear, Trainers, Workers
collections.description: We have a nice range of footwear for riders, trainers, and workers including riding boots, work boots, and casual footwear from top Australian and international brands. Includes men's and women's, and boots and shoes for children. Brands include Tucci, Ariat & Durango. You can also view our unisex range of riding boots for men and women, and horse riding clothes.

collections.title: Horse Riding Breeches - Quality International & National Brands
collections.description: Below you can see the super range of breeches from quality brands around the world and also Australia made.

collections.title: Horse Boots - All Types
collections.description: Browse our selection of boots for horse for all purposes and equestrian disciplines. Everything from jumping to tendon boots, to float boots.

collections.title: Shop Zilco Rugs, Horse Boots & Accessories
collections.description: Zilco have a great range of quality horse and pony gear for all seasons and all disciplines. In particular, the all seasons Zilco horse rugs are very popular.

collections.title: Shop Kentucky Horsewear - Boots, Pads, Bonnets, Girths, Bandages & More
collections.description: Kentucky is synonymous with exceptional quality horse gear. Loved by professionals and amateurs alike, it's become a very popular brand in Australia. In particular check out the Kentucky tendon boots, bandages, showjumping pads, ear bonnets, Kentucky show rugs and more.

collections.title: Horse Rugs - All Types
collections.description: Below is our range of horse rugs and blankets of all types and sizes. It doesn't matter if your in need of a show or paddock rug, a winter or summer horse rugs for sale, or rug accessories, we have it all. Australia's top brands. Also includes used and 2nd hand rugs.

collections.title: Shop Eurohunter Equestrian Gear & Accessories
collections.description: Eurohunter has a great reputations for quality equestrian gear and product's including rugs, saddle pads, boots, halter and more. Amazing value for money.

collections.title: Horse Jewellery - Equine & Equestrian Themed
collections.description: Below you can see our range of quality equine jewellery. Specifically you can also visit the Kelly Herd jewellery range, earrings and also the horse ring jewellery range. Also see our Sabona athletic bracelet range.

collections.title: Buy Horse Riding Helmets For Equestrians
collections.description: We have a nice range of quality riding helmets from some of the top brands on the market. Brands include Kask, KEP, Samshield, Charles Owen brand, Suomy and more. If you're looking for helmets you might also be interested in our range of horse riding boots and riding clothing. Other safety categories include horse riding body protectors and horse riding air vests

collections.title: Shop Birds - Feed, Treats, Accessories, Supplies
Shop Horse Halters
collections.description: Below you can see our great range of horse and pony halters. We have some fantastic brands, such as Lemieux halters, Vibrant Equestrian, Cavallo, Kentucky and more. Also see our range of horse reins, bits, and western horse girths. Also see our rope halters, leather halters, and breakaway halters.

collections.title: Living Horse Tales Jewellery By Monika
Shop Horse Riding Stirrups & Leathers
collections.description: Browse this collection that includes a range of high-quality stirrups designed to improve the riding experience, featuring leading brands like Freejump, Zilco, and Prestige. These stirrups offer enhanced safety, comfort, and performance for riders of all levels. Be sure to check out the dedicated stirrup leathers collection and freejump stirrups.

collections.title: Leg Wraps & Bandages For Your Horse Or Pony
collections.description: We have a great selection of bandages from some of the top international and Australian brands, including ANKY bandages, Kentucky bandages, PS Of Sweden bandages and more. You may also be interested in our horse boots collection, and dedicated dressage bandage selection.

collections.title: Shop Equipe
collections.description: Equipe are a very popular and high quality European brand. Check out the range below.

collections.title: Accessories
collections.description: Below you can see our range of horse riding accessories.

collections.title: Shop Cavallo Products
collections.description: See the range of great Cavallo equestrian products.

collections.title: Shop BARE Equestrian Apparel & Gear
collections.description: BARE Equestrian is one the most popular equestrian brands in Australia right now, and their range of stylish equestrian wear including riding tights and leggings, polo tops, and a range of other accessories. Browser below the various products of the brand.

collections.title: Saddles For All Disciplines
collections.description: Check out our range of saddles for jumping, dressage, western, stock, all purpose and more. Some of the most popular brands available in Australia. We have come excellent brands including Eqiupe, Arena and more.

collections.title: Shop Kids Horse Toys
collections.description: Below you can see our range of quality kids toys. Great as gifts or for entertaining those young ones with an enthusiasm for equestrian. Be sure to check out our specific collections on Trail Of The Painted Pony toys, and Breyer kids horse toys. and horse books.

collections.title: Shop Thinline Global Australia
collections.description: Below you can see our range of Thinline Global products including saddle pads and squares, boots for horses and a range of other quality accessories for horse and riders. Visit Thinline Global in the USA for more information on the brand.

collections.title: Shop Hairy Pony Grooming Products
collections.description: Below you can see the great range of grooming products from Hairy Pony. They have a nice range of brushes, shampoos, gloss and much more. You may also be interested in our full collection of grooming supplies, including shampoo for horses and brands such as Sterling Essentials.

collections.title: Luggage For The Horse Rider
collections.description: Check out our selection of luggage for the rider from the top brands including Lemieux, Kentucky, Animo, and PS Of Sweden. Also see our dedicated page for Ariat gear bags and clutches & handbags.

collections.title: Shop Farrier Tools
collections.description: Below you can see our selection of farrier tools including hammers, nippers, studs, hoof knives, aprons, and everything else you'll ever need.

collections.title: Plum Tack - Quality Australia Riding Apparel & Clothing
Stable & Arena Gear
collections.description: We have a great selection of gear for keeping your stable, sheds, and arena neat and tidy, spotless, maintained and efficient. Categories include farriery, fencing gear, saddle racks, tack care, wheelbarrows, feeders, arena equipment and more!

collections.title: Shop Animo Equestrian Gear
collections.description: Animo is one of the most recognisable brands in the world when it comes to equestrian gear and clothing. Super quality at an affordable price. Check out our Animo women's breeches, men's Animo breeches.

collections.title: Shop Dy'On European Classic Equestrian Gear
collections.description: Below you can see our range of Dy'On. The brand was started in Belgium in 1964 with a pair of long chaps, and the brand grew from their. Included in the range are riding belts, Dy'on bridles, chaps, reins, and more.

collections.title: ELT  Equestrian
collections.description: Below you can see our range of ELT equestrian gear and clothing.

collections.title: PS Of Sweden
collections.description: Check out the range of quality PS Of Sweden products available from a number of different sellers within our marketplace. Products include dressage saddle pads, all purpose bridles, horse bandages, training shirts, casual tops, jackets, browbands and more. Visit the dedicated PS Of Sweden saddle pads range.

collections.title: Mask & Fly Veils For Horses & Ponies
collections.description: Browse our great selection of masks and fly veils for horses and ponies. Some great brands including masks by Lemieux, Fly Veils By Design, Buzz Off and Bucas, Wild Horse and many more.

collections.title: Shop Horse Riding Base Layers
collections.description: Below you can see our range of base layers from various brands such as Bare Equestrian, Ariat clothing and Lemieux clothing. Also check out our full women's horse riding apparel and men's horse riding apparel.
